title: Game Scoop Episode 636
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Seth Macy, and Justin Davis -- are discussing the pros and cons of both the PS5 and Xbox Series X, their huge success, Picross S Genesis Edition, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
